dcterms:creator: Yingxin Wu
Xiang Wang
An Zhang
Xiangnan He
Tat-Seng Chua
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset where each graph is composed of one base (Tree, Ladder, or Wheel) and one or more motifs that determine the abnormality of the graph. Each normal graph has a house motif and each anomaly has a 5-cycle motif.
dcterms:title: BM-MT

dcterms:creator: Zhitao Ying
Dylan Bourgeois
Jiaxuan You
Marinka Zitnik
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset where each normal graph has 1 or 2 house motifs and each anomaly has 3 or 4 house motifs.
dcterms:title: BM-MN

dcterms:creator: Zhitao Ying
Dylan Bourgeois
Jiaxuan You
Marinka Zitnik
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset where each normal graph has a cycle motif with 3-5 nodes and each anomaly has a cycle motif with 6-9 nodes.
dcterms:title: BM-MS

dcterms:creator: Boris Knyazev
Graham W Taylor
Mohamed Amer
dcterms:description: Derived from the MNIST-75sp superpixel dataset, where a specific class (digit 0) is considered normal and samples belonging to other classes are regarded as anomalies.
dcterms:title: MNIST-0

dcterms:creator: Boris Knyazev
Graham W Taylor
Mohamed Amer
dcterms:description: Derived from the MNIST-75sp superpixel dataset, where a specific class (digit 1) is considered normal and samples belonging to other classes are regarded as anomalies.
dcterms:title: MNIST-1

dcterms:creator: Asim Kumar Debnath
Rosa L Lopez de Compadre
Gargi Debnath
Alan J Shusterman
Corwin Hansch
dcterms:description: A molecular property prediction dataset where nonmutagenic molecules are considered normal samples and mutagenic molecules are considered anomalies.
dcterms:title: MUTAG
